properties.displayName: UAC Bypass Using Event Viewer RecentViews
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "\\Event Viewer\\RecentViews" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\EventV~1\\RecentViews") and ProcessCommandLine contains ">"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Event Viewer RecentViews
